text: Eteke yetiya sihamta tara bisaye sampurnaraupe niraasa ha’la, tetiya sihamta paraamarsa karaibalai ekantabharae gota khale. Sihamtara majara danara jane ka’le, ‘tomalokara manata achene tomalokara pitrye tomalokara paraa allahara namata angikara laiche arau iyara agate'o tomaloke i'uchuphara bisaye an'yaya karaichila. Gatike ma'i ketiya'o e'i desa erai naya'om yetiyalaike mora pitrye moka anumati nidiba athaba allahe mora babe kono phayacala nakaraiba arau teraemi sraestha phayacalakarai’
